name: Our Little Gameshow
description:
First of all, apology for any wrong grammar in any dialog throughout the game. English is my second language and I tried my best to deliver.

The game only has one ending because I'm that bad at writing stuff.

The source codes : https://github.com/sh1ft15/gameshow

Control:
Left-Click the dialogues bubble to progress through the dialogues
Left-Click the alphabet bubble to complete the words.
